sentences.en: A hypnotherapist will hypnotize you and will stop you from smoking.
sentences.cn: 一位催眠治疗师将对你实施催眠，从而帮你戒烟。

sentences.en: Did you know chickens are the easiest critters on earth to hypnotize?
sentences.cn: 你知道鸡是最容易被催眠的家禽 吗 ?

sentences.en: Sacrifice can no longer be cast on troops you don't own but temporarily control via Hypnotize.
sentences.cn: 牺牲不能施展于非你所有而只是暂时被你的催眠控制的部队.

sentences.en: She hypnotize him into do thing against his own will.
sentences.cn: 她给他施催眠术让他做出违反本意的事。

sentences.en: Surprisingly, the ability to hypnotize yourself can be learnt in a single session.
sentences.cn: 出人意料的是，自我催眠术只要上一次课就可以学会。

sentences.en: Tom tried to hypnotize me but he was unsuccessful.
sentences.cn: 汤姆想为我催眠但他没成功.

sentences.en: We were completely hypnotized by her performance of the Haydn.
sentences.cn: 我们完全陶醉在她演奏的海顿作品之中。

sentences.en: You can now cast attack spells on creatures you control via Hypnotize.
sentences.cn: 可以对被你催眠的生物施展攻击魔法.

words.tran_cn: 催眠的，催眠术的；易于催眠的
[心理] 催眠分析；催眠精神分析

trans.tran_cn: 使着迷；对…施催眠术；使恍惚
trans.tran_en: to produce a sleep-like state in someone so that you can influence their thoughts and actions

trans.tran_cn: 对…施催眠术，使着迷，使精神恍惚
